parameters.name: OperateType
parameters.description: The operation on the vulnerabilities. Set the value to **vul_fix**, which indicates vulnerability fixing.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the vulnerabilities that you want to fix. Set the value to **cve**, which indicates Linux software vulnerabilities.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUIDs of servers for which you want to fix vulnerabilities.

parameters.name: VulNames
parameters.description: The names of the vulnerabilities that you want to fix.
